item.description:
Let's go out to Tavern on the Square in Salem MA for a great brunch.

We did this event last year and was amazed at all the food, the amazing staff and the great time we all had.

If you would like to see a sampling of the food on the Brunch menu, please go to the Tavern's website:   http://www.taverninthesquare.com/tavsalem/content/brunch

 

The tavern has a Prixe fix brunch menu and also have a regular menu that can be ordered from.

The Prixe fix is $15.00 pp which includes tea & coffee

We will need to make a reservation for this event, so please rsvp as soon as possible if you are planning on attending.

If you are planning on attending and you get lost or are running late, please call the Meetup Cellphone at 978-304-2811.

 

Hope to see you at the Tavern

Donna & Janet
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Tavern on The Square Salem MA
